elements.label: Workshop
elements.description: A have built myself a place to build more.

elements.label: A Synopsis of the Infinite Prime Mover
elements.description: A thick journal that complexly details non-euclidean and paradoxial mechanics the author saw in dreams, along with a glut of information regarding how one might go about creating such devices, many of its pages marked with indecipherable scrawls. The book seems to have been written by a child with absolutely no mechanical education.

elements.label: Temptation: Clockwork
elements.description: I can become the perfect blend of organic and inorganic. Beyond human.

elements.label: More Machine than Human
elements.description: What I seek is beyond immortality. Beyond pain. Beyond emotion.

elements.label: Infiltration Commands
elements.description: This set of documents lays out what may be found within the Suppression Bureau; evidence in storage, confiscated equipment and documents, and those who have already been suppressed.
